title: A Casebook of Murder: A Compelling Study of the World's Most Macabre Murder Cases
description: Contents include: The Beginnings (Gilles de Rais, Thomas Malory, The Crusades etc.); The Age of Gin (Dick Turpin, The Newgate calendar, Hanging etc.); Cannibals & Rapists (Red Barn Murder, Sarah Woodcock rape, transportation to Australia, Dignum & Cornerford etc.); Into the Age of Violence ( Burle & Hare, Jack the Ripper, Texarcana murder, the Bavarian Ripper etc.); The Age of Detection (Billoir, Ravachol, William Herschel & the discovery of fingerprints, Karl Hussman etc.); Chamber of Horrors (H. H. Holmes & Nightmare castle, Ed Gein, the Polish Ripper Moors Murder case etc).
author: Colin Wilson
